title: IT Services Technician
description: Provided technical support to faculty, staff, and students, diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and network issues efficiently.#Collaborated with faculty and staff to understand their technology needs and deliver appropriate solutions.#Troubleshot complex technical problems across Windows, macOS, and Linux environments using systematic problem-solving approaches.#Documented technical procedures and contributed to the internal knowledge base to support team consistency.

sub_title: Blue Nucleus - GVSU Applied Computing Institute
title: Software Engineer
description: Developed an AI-powered summary microservice for Eli Review using Flask, Cohere, and Mistral, integrating AWS SQS for asynchronous job processing and implementing deduplication logic to generate scalable, high-quality summaries of large user-review datasets.#Built RESTful API endpoints and streamlined data flows between the centralized database, LLM pipelines, and SQS workers, significantly improving feedback-analysis throughput and system reliability.#Engineered a full CI/CD automation framework for the Laker Mobile iOS app using Fastlane, replacing manual release workflows with reproducible pipelines for code signing, certificate management, and TestFlight distribution.#Implemented secure secrets management and produced end-to-end operational documentation, ensuring maintainability and long-term continuity for future development teams.
